pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Model-Based Clustering for Data Sets with Missing Values at Random // Implementation of robust model-based cluster analysis for data sets with missing values at random. The models used are: Multivariate Contaminated Normal Mixture (MCNM, Tong and Tortora, 2022, doi:10.1007/s11634-021-00476-1), Multivariate Generalized Hyperbolic Mixture (MGHM, Wei et al., 2019, doi:10.1016/j.csda.2018.08.016), Multivariate Skew's t Mixture (MStM, Wei et al., 2019, doi:10.1016/j.csda.2018.08.016), Multivariate t Mixture (MtM, Wang et al., 2004, doi:10.1016/j.patrec.2004.01.010), and Multivariate Normal Mixture (MNM, Ghahramani and Jordan, 1994, doi:10.21236/ADA295618).
